Exercises.Name: Back Extensions
Exercises.Description: If you don't have a GHD, lay on a heavy med ball tucked under your hips with your feet against the wall. With your hands behind your head and keeping your back straight, bend at your hips. The end of your range of motion is the last moment your back remains straight and doesn't curve. The come up, back to spine parallel to the ground

Exercises.Name: Bent over reverse flies
Exercises.Description: standing, chest parallel to the ground, raise one arm with or without weight from hanging straight down, perpendicular to the ground, out to the side, parallel to the ground.

Exercises.Name: Shrug/rolls
Exercises.Description: Weighted or not, stand up straight and roll your shoulders forward and backward, pausing at the top.
